thread.title: Updated: 4 men injured in 3 Santa Ana shootings
thread.title_full: Updated: 4 men injured in 3 Santa Ana shootings

author: DEEPA BHARATH
title: Updated: 4 men injured in 3 Santa Ana shootings
text:
SEND PDF 
SANTA ANA – Two men were injured, one critically, in a shooting Saturday night, police said. 
Officials received reports of shots fired around 6:57 p.m. in an alley in the 900 block of South Townsend Street “with a possible victim down,” said Santa Ana Police Sgt. David Lima. 
When officers arrived, they found a man who was shot in the upper torso. He was taken to a local hospital in critical condition, Lima said. 
Lima said a few minutes later, another man who was shot - possibly in the vicinity of the other shooting - showed up at a local hospital with a gunshot wound. He is in stable condition. 
Lima said police believe the shootings are linked, but a motive for the attacks is not yet known. 
The men’s ages and identities were not immediately available. Police are still at the scene investigating.
